summary: This document is a set of 30-minute check sheets for the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, dated July 31, 2019. The sheets record staff checks on inmates in continuous lockdown status, such as administrative detention or disciplinary segregation, requiring observation at least twice per hour. The forms are reviewed by lieutenants and a captain.

keyFacts: The document is a prison log sheet for the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at MCC New York dated July 31, 2019.
It details a 30-minute check protocol for inmates in continuous lockdown status (administrative detention or disciplinary segregation).
The protocol requires staff to observe each inmate at least twice per hour on an irregular schedule.
The sheets are reviewed by a Morning Watch Lieutenant and a Captain.
The document is part of standard prison operational records, not containing specific names of inmates or staff.
